context.lastInteraction: Finance-focused discovery call with Javier Raynaud (CFO)

stakeholders.name: Javier Raynaud
stakeholders.title: CFO/Finance Lead
stakeholders.notes: Neutral-to-Friendly (explicitly said €50K+ too high, but engaged and transparent)

stakeholders.name: Fernando Lopezlavin
stakeholders.title: Head of Revenue
stakeholders.notes: Supporter (meeting Jan 20 to validate revenue use cases)

stakeholders.title: Operations

context.history: Initial discovery call with CFO/Finance Lead to understand finance automation needs

metrics.notes: Validated: ~€60K/year opportunity cost + staff time. ~730 emails/month at Madrid (34 rooms). Response time goal: <6 hrs for groups, <2 hrs for individuals.

economicBuyer.notes: Self-serve/Teams tier - no major approval needed. Salomao/Fernando can likely approve training + solutions partner engagement.

decisionCriteria.notes: Clear: Can they build the email automation workflow? Will it improve response time? Does the plan pricing fit task volume?

decisionProcess.notes: Simple for self-serve: Trial → Solutions partner engagement → Select plan based on task volume

paperProcess.notes: Standard Teams signup - no enterprise procurement needed

pain.notes: Validated by Fernando: losing group bookings to faster competitors, staff spending too much time on emails instead of guest service

champion.notes: Matteo is technical lead but wasn't on this call. Fernando/Salomao are engaged. Need to ensure Matteo gets the training materials.

competition.notes: No direct competitor for email automation use case. They're evaluating Zapier + solutions partners vs building internally.

groundTruth.whatHappenedNext: Finance use cases mostly invalidated by Sage 200 implementation, pivot to revenue use cases with Fernando scheduled
actualRisksThatMaterialized: Primary finance use cases may be covered by existing systems

context.lastInteraction: Revenue use case validation call with Fernando Lopezlavin
painPoints: Staff time diverted from guest service
